entries.title: No One on Twitter Is Safe From Elon Musk
entries.description: The entrepreneur says he's cracking down on doxing. Many see his account-blocking spree as self-serving.

entries.title: Trump’s Twitter Ban Was Unfair, but Not for the Reason You Think
entries.description: If Twitter had implemented its rules uniformly, other world leaders would have been banned too.

entries.title: How to Stop ChatGPT from Going Off the Rails
entries.description: The viral chatbot wasn’t up to writing a WIRED newsletter. But it's fluent enough to raise questions about how to keep eloquent AI systems accountable.

entries.title: Big Tech Laid Off Thousands. Here’s Who Wants Them Next
entries.description: Governments, nonprofits, and small startups hope to scoop up people let go by the likes of Meta and Amazon. It’s their big chance to lure top-tier talent.

entries.title: The Spawn of ChatGPT Will Try to Sell You Things
entries.description: Companies are exploring how to adapt powerful new chatbot technology to negotiate with customer service—and to persuade humans to buy stuff.

entries.title: Welcome to Digital Nomadland
entries.description: A Portuguese island created a village for remote workers, promising community to the newcomers and prosperity to the locals—then delivered on neither.
